summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Enterprise Project Management system. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success). Frontend has authentication persistence and navigation issues preventing full functionality testing.

ui_bugs.issue: Authentication not persisting between page loads - user gets logged out
Navigation links not accessible from dashboard - cannot navigate between pages

integration_issues.issue: Cannot click navigation links, user redirected back to landing page

issues: HTML validation warnings - div nested inside p tags causing hydration errors

passed_tests: Backend API - Task management with status updates
Backend API - Chat channels and messaging
Frontend - Dashboard displays with charts and stats
Frontend - Dark theme and responsive design
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix authentication persistence issue in AuthContext - JWT tokens not being maintained between page loads. Fix navigation system in Layout component - users cannot navigate between dashboard/projects/tasks/chat pages. These are blocking issues preventing full app functionality.
